aboutUs.title: OUR STORY & AMBIANCE
aboutUs.introduction: At La Bodega de la Ferradura, we blend the tradition of homemade cooking with a modern and sophisticated touch. Our menu is a true ode to Mediterranean and mountain gastronomy, with dishes made from fresh, quality ingredients: sea and mountain paellas, creative and traditional tapas, fresh fish and grilled meats, homemade desserts, and a selection of national wines that pair perfectly.
aboutUs.paragraph1: Our restaurant in Alp has been designed to offer a complete experience: a cozy interior dining room with rustic and elegant details, and an outdoor terrace ideal for good weather days. Enjoy an intimate and relaxed atmosphere, perfect for both romantic dinners and family meals, with professional and attentive service that will make you feel welcome from the first moment.
